wikipedia_page.main: Marcus George (born  (1986-02-28) 28 February 1986) is an English rugby league footballer for Halifax. George began his career on Halifax's scholarship programme but turned professional with Huddersfield Giants. After rejecting a contract from the Huddersfield Giants, George had a spell on a pay-as-you-play deal at the Bradford Bulls, the club he left to join Halifax in the 2006 season. He has since established himself as a first team regular at The Shay. George plays in the Wing position. He scored 7-tries in 14-appearances in his first season with Halifax, and 12-tries from 13-appearances in his second season.

response: Luke George is the son of the rugby league footballer Wilf George, and the younger brother of the rugby league footballer Marcus George.

link_mentions.page: List of family relations in rugby league
response: *Marcus George (born 1986), Halifax RLFC, Huddersfield Giants and Bradford Bulls player; son of Wilf and brother of Luke
Wilf George is the father of the rugby league footballers; Marcus George, and Luke George.
